ygData.subject: Re: Faction Standing
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night, another paladin, a warrior and myself were camping in the east commonlands near one of the orc Centurion camps.  We killed a large number of the
ygData.messageBody:
Last night, another paladin, a warrior and myself were camping in the east
commonlands near one of the orc Centurion camps. We killed a large number
of the evil beasts and were rewarded with a great number of Deathfist Belts.
However, another side effect is that whenever I personally finished off an
orc, my standing would get better with the Knights of Truth and the common
peoples and such. How can you tell what your standing with the guild is? I
went back to the Hall of Truth and considered everybody and talked to a
number of the npc's at the Hall of Truth. I also checked the prices they
offered me for my goods and the prices of the items they had. I couldn't
detect any changes. How can you tell if your standing has gotten better?
And how many times do you have to kill orcs to bring about a change?

Grod
11th Level Paladin
Innoruuk Server
